def quotable(name, quote):
    return '{} said: "{}"'.format(name, quote)

def quotable(name, quote):
    return f'{name} said: "{quote}"'

def quotable(name, quote):
    return name + ' said: ' + '"' + quote + '"'

def quotable(name, quote):
    said = " said: "
    quotation_mark = "\""
    return name + said + quotation_mark + quote + quotation_mark

def quotable(name, quote):
    return name + ' said: "' + quote + '"'

def quotable(n, q):
    return f"{n} said: \"{q}\""
